interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: OGC Cosmetics Hair Mask Anti Frizz 8.5 Fl Oz - 250 Milliliters Review Date: 2022/05/25 Store: OGC Cosmetics Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'OGC Cosmetics', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Hair Type': 'Frizzy', 'Product Benefits': 'Frizz Control', 'Product Dimensions': '7.09 x 2.36 x 2.36 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'OGC Cosmetics'} Review Text: I’m going to go ahead and compare this to what most other people rave about as being a gold standard hair care product - Olaplex - which does nothing for my hair, and is expensive for what you get.

This is much better value for money, works better than “O” and smells nicer.

My hair looks soft, bouncy, voluminous, almost shiny (my hair never shines likes in the shampoo ads) and the frizzy back of it, is completely gone.
I must explain i have 2 textured hair - at the back it’s very curly, and goes frizzy, at the front, it’s limp and wavy, gets frizzy on the sides when I’m asleep, so for me, this stuff is great. My Mother takes one look at me on FaceTime, and immediately criticizes my hair, tells me it looks dry - i have to explain to her, that what she is seeing is my frizzy hair from having just woken up, or maybe it is frizzy from being dry, i don’t even know, I’m not a trichologist for heaven’s sake. But she did say that my hair was looking better when she spoke to me the other day.
It makes my curls defined, and my waves soft and silky. It fixes the frizz.
I’d definitely get this again. Review Title: Good hair mask Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
invisibobble Pink Ball Hair Ties with Coil, TWINS Prima Ballerina - Ponytail Holder - No Damage, Wrap and Twist - Pain-Free Hair Accessories for Girls and Women - Gentle for Girls Teens and Thick Hair invisibobble {'Color': 'Prima Ballerina', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'Invisibobble', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Language': 'Spanish', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IB-TW', 'Manufacturer': 'invisibobble'} My hair isn’t very thick, it’s maybe shoulder length, and i sometimes wear it up, but i don’t have too much hair so regular scrunchies and hair elastics are too much for my thinning hair. This small thing works great on my particular length, thickness and curliness of hair. You just twiddle the bobbles around each other, and it makes my hair look classier than i thought it would. It works very well because of my curls. I did used to used the bigger spiral hair ties from this brand when I had thicker, longer hair, but those are too big for the amount of hair i have now. This works perfectly though. It’s just right. Good for my thinning, but very curly hair invisibobble Pink Ball Hair Ties with Coil, TWINS Prima Ballerina - Ponytail Holder - No Damage, Wrap and Twist - Pain-Free Hair Accessories for Girls and Women - Gentle for Girls Teens and Thick Hair invisibobble {'Color': 'Prima Ballerina', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'Invisibobble', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Language': 'Spanish', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IB-TW', 'Manufacturer': 'invisibobble'} My hair is maybe shoulder length, layered, and thinning, and i can twiddle one these up into my hair with no issues. I feel like someone with thicker hair might struggle getting one in.

I really like them, as they give me a messy, sort of updo kind of look, without it looking like a formal ponytail. Which is impossible for me anyway, with my layered curly thinning hair. In fact the only way for to achieve a smooth head of hair is to use a flatiron and a ton of product, and i just don’t do that. It looks unnatural on me. I like these for the ability to look casual and unstructured. When i had longer thicker hair,i used the original invisibobble spirals, which were a game changer. These products do not tangle in your hair like a regular hair elastic often does. The products made by this company have revolutionized ponytails. Perfect for short to medium hair Grown Alchemist Anti-Pollution Primer (50ml / 1.69oz) Grown Alchemist ['GROWN ALCHEMIST ANTI – POLLUTION PRIMER. A revolutionary lightweight detoxifying, silicone-free gel-primer absorbs instantly creating the ultimate protected, smooth surface; hydration levels are visibly boosted, the skin’s natural healthy barrier function is noticeably strengthened while wrinkles and pores are blurred to create healthy, flawless-looking skin. BIOACTIVE INGREDIENTS. Offering a blend of Bioactive Ingredients including: Anti-Pollution Shield Complex - A potent formula, Prebiotic-Peptide, Gel-Primer Base Complex offers a silicone-free base with skin hydrating properties and Ganoderma Mushroom Extract inhibits oxidation and inflammation which assists in the detoxification of skin cells. THE GROWN ALCHEMIST DIFFERENCE. Providing the most advanced natural cosmetic products, everything is formulated with the purest and highest quality active ingredients supported by scientific research and clinical results. Developed by a multidisciplinary team of skin scientists and nutritionists, GA has developed a unique, natural and holistic beauty system, combining both topical and ingestible skincare. SCIENTIFICALLY-INNOVATIVE FORMULAS. Grown Alchemist formulates products that represent a new evolution in skincare. Scientifically–innovative formulas are capable of influencing the way the body repairs and regenerates the skin. Through a holistic scientific approach, GA identifies the mechanisms that regulate the aging process of the body and skin. RELEASING YOUR TRUE BEAUTY. Grown Alchemist continues to challenge the status quo in the world of beauty, formulating ground-breaking anti-aging results. Founders Keston and Jeremy have stayed true to their promise to create advanced natural products that improve the health of skin cells, optimizing their function and ultimately, releasing your true beauty.'] {'Brand': 'Grown Alchemist', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Coverage': 'Lightweight', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Language': 'English', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 1.57 x 1.97 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '9340800005494', 'Manufacturer': 'Grown Alchemist'} I was fooled by the look of this in the tube - it looked dark. So i was somewhat surprised when i squeezed some out onto my hand and it’s actually colourless.

Upon application, it smooths instantly into my skin, and transforms to a perfectly powdery finish, silky almost. Pores are minimized definitely, and it makes applying make up afterward, an absolute breeze.

I was using Tatcha Primers - i tried both their Liquid Silk Canvas, which is much lighter in texture than their Silk Canvas which i always found a little difficult spreading evenly.

This Grown Alchemist Anti Pollution Primer reminds me of a favourite i used - Benefit Porefessional, with a similar texture to that.

It does minimize my pores. It makes my skin feel great, and ml for ml works out cheaper than Benefit’s, so that’s a win win situation.

And whether i apply foundation or just a powder on top, both go on super smoothly, and nothing settles into the cracks.

I’m very much enjoying this primer. Great texture Kopari Bubblegum Lip Gloss Kit | Strawberry, Grape, and Bubble Gum Flavors | Hydrating Blend of Shea Butter and Coconut Oil to Nourish and Soothe Chapped Lips | Vegan and Cruelty-Free Kopari {'Brand': 'Kopari', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Sheer', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Smoothening,Soothing,Shine,Nourishing', 'Package Dimensions': '4.69 x 3.19 x 1.34 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '850036833345'} Kopari, you have done it again.
Fabulous little set of Lip Glosses, super moisturizing and contain Coconut Oil, Shea Butter and Squalane for those dry peely cracked lips.

They go on nice and smooth, just gently squeeze the tube, and a little bit comes out, but don’t press too hard. They look great over a Matte Finish Lippy, or just on their own, of the three flavours (grape, bubblegum, and strawberry) my fave is the strawberry, which has a reddish pink tint, but isn’t strongly coloured, and goes on sheer. It wouldn’t affect the colour of any lippy you were wearing underneath.

They aren’t sticky, and i no longer have long hair that clings to such products, so i can wear them without that happening anymore.

I like this set a lot, it’s a beautiful presentation, as are all Kopari products I’ve had, and could easily be gifted to any Lip Gloss lovers out there, of any age, in my humble opinion. Moisturizing ingredients OGC Cosmetics Hair Mask Anti Frizz 8.5 Fl Oz - 250 Milliliters OGC Cosmetics {'Brand': 'OGC Cosmetics', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Hair Type': 'Frizzy', 'Product Benefits': 'Frizz Control', 'Product Dimensions': '7.09 x 2.36 x 2.36 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'OGC Cosmetics'} I’m going to go ahead and compare this to what most other people rave about as being a gold standard hair care product - Olaplex - which does nothing for my hair, and is expensive for what you get.

This is much better value for money, works better than “O” and smells nicer.

My hair looks soft, bouncy, voluminous, almost shiny (my hair never shines likes in the shampoo ads) and the frizzy back of it, is completely gone.
I must explain i have 2 textured hair - at the back it’s very curly, and goes frizzy, at the front, it’s limp and wavy, gets frizzy on the sides when I’m asleep, so for me, this stuff is great. My Mother takes one look at me on FaceTime, and immediately criticizes my hair, tells me it looks dry - i have to explain to her, that what she is seeing is my frizzy hair from having just woken up, or maybe it is frizzy from being dry, i don’t even know, I’m not a trichologist for heaven’s sake. But she did say that my hair was looking better when she spoke to me the other day.
It makes my curls defined, and my waves soft and silky. It fixes the frizz.
I’d definitely get this again. Good hair mask
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Type & Concerns:** The user has shoulder-length, thinning, and layered curly hair, favoring gentle accessories that enhance styling without adding bulk. They face challenges with frizz, particularly in their two textured hair, where the back is very curly and frizzy, while the front is limp and wavy. 
- **Product Preferences:** They prefer lightweight, moisturizing formulations, valuing ingredients like coconut oil and shea butter that soothe dry skin. The user's recent purchase of a hair mask reflects their interest in finding effective solutions for frizz control and defining curls.
- **Functional Focus:** Values practicality and ease of use, seeking products that deliver effective results tailored to their specific hair and skin needs without complicated application techniques.
- **Aesthetic Considerations:** Aims for a relaxed yet stylish appearance, aligning with a casual aesthetic while appreciating products that enhance their overall look.
- **Brand Loyalty:** Shows familiarity and loyalty to quality brands that offer innovative solutions. They are open to exploring various product types to meet their hair and skincare needs.
- **Review Behavior:** Actively engages in thoughtful reviews, focusing on product effectiveness and personal experiences. They express strong appreciation for products that are moisturizing, non-sticky, and easy to apply, as seen in their recent positive review of a hair mask that significantly improved their hair's appearance.

Overall, the user prioritizes effective and gentle solutions that enhance their beauty routine while reflecting a commitment to comfort, practicality, and an effortless aesthetic.
